Widget.Title: Globe Viewer
AddMarker.Title: Add Marker
AddMarker.ShortHelp: Creates a marker on the globe.
AddMarker.LongHelp: Click the command, and either click a location, or enter coordinates. Then, customize the marker.
Advanced.Title: Advanced Options
Advanced.ShortHelp: Lets you use the 3DS Map, or define Tile Map Service (TMS) options.
EditMarker.Title: Edit Marker
EditMarker.ShortHelp: Lets you change the color, position, and description of a marker.
EditMarker.LongHelp: Click the command, select a marker, and make your changes.
ImportFile.Title: Load Data
ImportFile.ShortHelp: Lets you load GeoRSS feeds or GeoJSON data files.
Interaction.Title: Interaction
Interaction.ShortHelp: Lets you customize the way you interact with the globe.
Reset.Title: Reset All
Save.Title: Save
Theme.Title: Theme Options
Theme.ShortHelp: Lets you change the style of the map and the background color of the globe.
